role.name: XTAL1
role.desc: Pin for connecting external clock source (crystal, resonator..) for MCU (input)

role.name: XTAL2
role.desc: XTAL2 - Pin for connecting external clock source (crystal, resonator..) for MCU (output)

role.name: INT0
role.desc: External Interrupt source 0 to the MCU.

role.name: OC0B
role.desc: Output compare matchB output. The pin can serve as an external output for the Timer/Counter0 output compareB. The OC0B pin is also the output pin for the PWM mode timer function.

role.name: INT1
role.desc: External Interrupt source 1 to the MCU.

role.name: AIN0
role.desc: Analog Comparator Positive Input. When configured as an input and with the internal MOS pull-up resistor switched off, this pin also serves as the positive input of the on-chip Analog Comparator.

role.name: INT2
role.desc: External Interrupt source 2 to the MCU.

role.name: AIN1
role.desc: AIN1, Analog Comparator Negative Input. When configured as an input and with the internal MOS pull-up resistor switched off, this pin also serves as the negative input of the on-chip Analog Comparator.

role.name: RXD1
role.desc: Receive Data (data input pin for the UART). When the UART receiver is enabled, this pin is configured as an input. When the UART forces this pin to be an input, a logical state on PORT register will turn on the internal pull-up. Channel 1

role.name: INT3
role.desc: External Interrupt source 3 to the MCU.

role.name: TXD1
role.desc: Transmit Data (data output pin for the UART). When the UART transmitter is enabled, this pin is configured as an output. Channel 1

role.name: INT5
role.desc: External Interrupt source 5 to the MCU.

role.name: INT6
role.desc: External Interrupt source 6 to the MCU.

role.name: INT7
role.desc: External Interrupt source 7 to the MCU.

role.name: /SS
role.desc: Slave Select pin for using with SPI.

role.name: SCK
role.desc: Clock input pin for memory up/downloading or SPI.

role.name: MOSI
role.desc: Data input pin for memory downloading or SPI.

role.name: PDI
role.desc: SPI Serial Programming Data input. During serial program downloading, this pin is used as data input line.

role.name: MISO
role.desc: Master input/Slave Output pin for SPI or programming

role.name: PDO
role.desc: SPI Serial Programming Data output. During Serial Program Downloading, this pin is used as data output line.

role.name: OC0A
role.desc: Output compare matchA output: The pin can serve as an external output for the Timer/Counter0 output compareA. The OC0A pin is also the output pin for the PWM mode timer function.

role.name: OC1C
role.desc: Output compare matchC output. The pin can serve as an external output for the Timer/Counter1 output compareB. The OC1C pin is also the output pin for the PWM mode timer function.

role.name: INT4
role.desc: External Interrupt source 4 to the MCU.

role.name: OC1A
role.desc: Output compare matchA output: The pin can serve as an external output for the Timer/Counter1 output compareA. The OC1A pin is also the output pin for the PWM mode timer function.

role.name: /RESET
role.desc: Reset pin for MCU, active at low.

role.name: dW
role.desc: debugWIRE On-chip debug system uses a One-wire, bi-directional interface to control the program flow, execute AVR instructions in the CPU and to program the different non-volatile memories.

role.name: OC1B
role.desc: Output compare matchB output. The pin can serve as an external output for the Timer/Counter1 output compareB. The OC1B pin is also the output pin for the PWM mode timer function.

role.name: UCAP
role.desc: USB Pads Internal Regulator Output supply voltage. Should be connected to an external capacitor.

role.name: D+/SCK
role.desc: USB Full Speed Positive Data Upstream port / Clock port for PS/2.

role.name: D-/SDATA
role.desc: USB Full Speed Negative Data Upstream port / Data port for PS/2

role.name: UVCC
role.desc: USB Pads Internal Regulator Input supply voltage.
